speaker: President.
english: President. The next item is the report ( A6-0133/2007 ), by Mr Sánchez Presedo, on behalf of the Committee on Economic and Monetary Affairs, on the Green Paper on Damages actions for breach of the EC antitrust rules ( 2006/2207(INI) )

agenda_item: Damages actions for breach of competition rules (debate)
